name: Latinwebcamp.github.io
tagline: Welcome to Summer@Latin's Web Development Camp
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This will act as the main landing page for the Web Development Camp. We will break out links to individual exercises from here.

Day 1: HTML - History, layout, box model

Day 2: CSS - custom styling, classes

Day 3: CSS continued - making pages dynamic, adding animations/fades

Day 4: JavaScript - intro to JavaScript and other languages

Day 5: Final Exercise - Do one of three different exercises.

[Tag Fixing 1](http://jsbin.com/gares/1/edit)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
